channel.title: Whonix forum uses a lot of SVG for buttons and icons that won't display on TBB's "Safest" security setting
channel.description:
The buttons for markup when making a post like bold etc all use SVG, which on TBB's highest security setting do not display. Hovering over them I get their title though which makes them usable.
When making a post there is a button above the title and next to "Create a new Topic" which is empty, inspecting it I think it is some kind of dropdown menu, but I don't know. Has id "ember1094".
I don't know of what importance this kind of "usability" is to the Whonix project, thought I'd bring it up though in case it is. If not that's understandable, low hanging fruit here. The SVG stuff isn't significant for security here since needing to enable JS to post anyway, which I dislike because of poor performance at least while on Tor, so more about usability again there, but I digress.. lmao.

item.title: Whonix forum uses a lot of SVG for buttons and icons that won't display on TBB's "Safest" security setting
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
SVG: Tor Browser issue. Not a Whonix issue. https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle applies. A ticket for SVG in Tor Browser exists at Tor Browser issue tracker.

Turn off Javascript in Whonix Forums Website
Looking at the new forum, it has put me off to registering because it requires: Javascript to browse the site properly Email-address to join site Both these shouldn’t be compulsory for this forum.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix forum uses a lot of SVG for buttons and icons that won't display on TBB's "Safest" security setting

item.title: Whonix forum uses a lot of SVG for buttons and icons that won't display on TBB's "Safest" security setting

item.description:
The buttons for markup when making a post like bold etc all use SVG, which on TBB’s highest security setting do not display. Hovering over them I get their title though which makes them usable.

When making a post there is a button above the title and next to “Create a new Topic” which is empty, inspecting it I think it is some kind of dropdown menu, but I don’t know. Has id “ember1094”.

I don’t know of what importance this kind of “usability” is to the Whonix project, thought I’d bring it up though in case it is. If not that’s understandable, low hanging fruit here. The SVG stuff isn’t significant for security here since needing to enable JS to post anyway, which I dislike because of poor performance at least while on Tor, so more about usability again there, but I digress… lmao.
